## How to test
<!-- Are there directions to test/review? -->
<!--
### Coverage and basic unit test check
1. update the NPM packages with `$ npm install`
1. `$ npm test`
-->

### Interactive unit test check
1. update the NPM packages with `$ npm install`
1. `$ npm run test:dev`
-->

### Local run check
1. update the NPM packages with `$ npm install`
1. `$ npm run start:stage`
1. next...
-->
<!--
### Check the build
1. update the NPM packages with `$ npm install`
1. `$ npm run build`
1. next...
